ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The others will say, 'The truth is that you were not muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will say: "No, you were the ones who would not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will say: “Nay, you yourselves were not the ones who would believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Others will respond, "It was you who did not want to have any faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will answer, “You yourselves did not have faith!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will reply: "Nay, you yourselves were not believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall say: Nay, you (yourselves) were not believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those say, 'No; on the contrary, you were not believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They answer: Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will say, "No! It was you who would not believe --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will say: nay! ye yourselves were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will answer, ‘No, you [yourselves] had no faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will reply: "Nay, ye yourselves had no Faith!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will reply: "Nay, you yourselves were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they reply: 'Rather, you were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “You yourselves were not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:29] They, the ones who were followed, say, to them [the followers]: ‘On the contrary! You were [simply] not believers, for it would only be true that we led you astray if you had actually been believers [in the first place] and then rejected faith and followed us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They answer) the satans would answer the humans: (Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers) in Allah.
